errors.test: Financial forms have proper error handling

recommendations: Run browser-based accessibility tests with axe-core
Test with screen readers (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver)
Verify keyboard navigation in actual browsers
Test color contrast with accessibility tools
Validate with users who have disabilities
